# Procedures

The first wave of this study will include recruitment of 60 high school students (ages 14-18) to take part in an intervention to improve body image and advocate for body positivity. Participants will be randomized to the Body Project (n = 20) or BAM (n = 40). Participants in both groups will complete four facilitator-lead, 1-hour sessions, and complete a series of assessments at baseline, post-intervention, and at the conclusion of the final session and 1-month follow-up.

## Recruitment

Recruitment sources include: (1) School administrators and teachers (2) flyers at area businesses (e.g. fitness centers, coffee shops) (3) online advertisement on social media platforms (4) Outreach to community-based organizations (5) Outreach to ED providers in the community
